did.unittitle: School of Nursing (University of Michigan) publications 1913-1998
did.abstract: Includes bibliographies, pamphlets and brochures, bulletins and college catalogs, calendars, directories, histories, manuals, newsletters, programs, proposals, surveys, and school yearbooks. Also contains publications from Continuing Education Services, the Office of Development and Alumni Affairs, the Nursing History Society, the Centennial Celebration, and nursing student groups

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: Publications are received periodically from the unit.

accessrestrict.p: The School of Nursing Publications are open for research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., School of Nursing (University of Michigan)
Publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: See the historical sketch in the finding aid for School of Nursing (University of Michigan) Records.

scopecontent.p: The Publications of the School of Nursing is divided into four series: Unit Publications, Sub-Unit Publications, Topical Files and Student Publications. Restricted files are directories which are closed for 10 years after the date of publication. They are in Box 7.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.corpname: University of Michigan--Students--Social life and customs.
University of Michigan. School of Nursing.

scopecontent.p: Unit Publications include bulletins and a run of the newsletters Bulletin and News and Notes, as well as The Scalpel and Paragon, student yearbooks of the School of Nursing. Also included is a college history. Faculty, graduate student and student handbooks will be found under the heading "Manuals".

scopecontent.p: Sub-Unit Publications consist of materials produced by units within the School of Nursing, These include the Office of Development and Alumni Affairs, Continuing Education Services, the Graduate Program in Surgical Nursing, the North Campus Nursing Center, the Nursing History Society, the Office of Student Services, and Sigma Theta Tau.

scopecontent.p: Topical Publications include materials relating to the Centennial Celebration and Martin Luther King Day activities.

did.unittitle: Diamond Jubilee of Nursing Education at the University of Michigan, 1891-1966, 1966

scopecontent.p: Student Publications are newsletters produced by students of the School of Nursing, such as The Artery, The Syndrome and The TPR.

The Archived Website series documents the academic programs, accomplishments, resources, events, and people at the School of Nursing. Content includes important news and announcements, publications (such as newsletters and course catalogs), and information about admissions, curriculum, degree requirements, faculty, and the overall mission of the School. The website series is arranged chronologically, with captures from 2002 and 2003 stored on CD. Starting in 2010, this archived website will be captured on a regular, ongoing basis as part of the University of Michigan Web Archives, hosted at http://webarchives.cdlib.org/a/universityofmichigan/.
